title: The Last Piece of Cake
description: A family has a problem: there is only one piece of cake left, and everyone wants it for themselves. What will they do? In the book The Last Piece of Cake, students will be surprised to discover how this dilemma gets resolved. The book uses detailed, colorful photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive sentence patterns to support the reader. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the problem and solution in a story as well as how to identify and use pronouns.
reviewWords: dessert, gobbles, grabs, invited, problem, soars
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Identify problems and solutions
phonics: Rhyme                : Identify and produce rhyming words
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word they
